title: Mom's Meatballs
instructions: In a large bowl, gently beat the egg.
Add the meats in small pieces, as well as the breadcrumbs anf parmesan cheese.
Gently mix until combined (tear and rotate).
Form mixture into 14 balls and place on a wire rack over a foil-lined baking sheet.
While baking, heat sauce in a pot.
Blot grease off meatballs and add into the sauce. Simmer for 20 minutes.
